name: Above The Clouds (theMADturtle)
description:
This is a little project I've been working on for the past couple of weeks I made it using the GODOT game engine and Aseprite.

In the game, You play as this little blob guy trying to get to the top of the tower to see the view from up above, but this journey is not easy! but don't you worry, to help you achieve this goal you are equipped with the ability to shoot a (very) bouncy cloud which will (hopefully) help you get to the top!

Controls:

  • Move: WASD or ARROW KEYS
  • Shoot: 'K' or 'X'
  • Restart: '='
